Zelenskyy expressed support for a trilateral meeting involving the US, Ukraine, and Russia, and he is scheduled to meet with Trump in Washington D.C. to discuss ending the conflict. He also emphasized the importance of European involvement and security guarantees.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/alaska-summit-done-zelenskyy-next-ukraine-president-set-for-talks-with-donald-trump-focus-on-ending-war/articleshow/123331424.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/alaska-summit-done-zelenskyy-next-ukraine-president-set-for-talks-with-donald-trump-focus-on-ending-war/articleshow/123331424.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 13:51:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="883231" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123331500,imgsize-883231.cms"/></item><item><title>'10/10' Alaska meeting: Inconclusive Trump-Putin talks leave India in limbo; here's how</title><description><![CDATA[The Alaska meeting between Trump and Putin concluded without a clear agreement, despite Trump's positive assessment. Putin emphasized addressing Russia's concerns, including Nato expansion, before any peace deal. Trump hinted at potential secondary tariffs on India for Russian oil purchases but deferred immediate action, leaving New Delhi uncertain about its trade relations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/inconclusive-trump-putin-talks-leaves-india-in-limbo/articleshow/123329991.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/inconclusive-trump-putin-talks-leaves-india-in-limbo/articleshow/123329991.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 11:54:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>CHIDANAND RAJGHATTA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="901845" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123330316,imgsize-901845.cms"/></item><item><title>How Goa managed to tame rabies: Inside state's drive that vaccinated 63k dogs in 30 days</title><description><![CDATA[Goa achieved a "rabies-controlled" status in 2021 after eliminating human rabies cases since 2017, following a 2014 outbreak that claimed 17 lives. Mission Rabies initiated mass vaccination and sterilization drives, significantly reducing cases. Cross-border transmission from neighboring states remains a challenge, prompting intensified vaccination efforts in border regions and mandatory pet vaccination declarations for visitors.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/goa/how-goa-managed-to-tame-rabies-inside-states-drive-that-vaccinated-63000-dogs-in-30-days/articleshow/123328961.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/goa/how-goa-managed-to-tame-rabies-inside-states-drive-that-vaccinated-63000-dogs-in-30-days/articleshow/123328961.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 09:39:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NIDA SAYED</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="490849" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328970,imgsize-490849.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Russia lost an oil client, which is India’: What Trump said before meeting Putin</title><description><![CDATA[US President Trump imposed a 25% tariff on India for its Russian crude oil trade, claiming it cost Russia a major client. Trump's remarks came after his recent decision to implement a 50% tariff on India’s exports to the US, citing India's oil trade with Russia as the reason.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/russia-lost-an-oil-client-which-is-india-what-donald-trump-said-before-meet-with-putin-secondary-sanctions-would-be-devastating/articleshow/123329127.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/russia-lost-an-oil-client-which-is-india-what-donald-trump-said-before-meet-with-putin-secondary-sanctions-would-be-devastating/articleshow/123329127.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 10:11:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="65262" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123329144,imgsize-65262.cms"/></item><item><title>'Like doomsday': Pak floods wreak havoc; over 320 killed; video captures devastation</title><description><![CDATA[Devastating flash floods in Pakistan, triggered by intense monsoon rains, have claimed at least 321 lives in the last 48 hours. Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province is the worst hit, with entire villages destroyed and communities cut off. Rescue efforts are underway, but hampered by washed-out roads and ongoing rainfall.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/like-doomsday-pakistan-floods-wreak-havoc-sweep-away-villages-over-320-killed-video-captures-devastation/articleshow/123330946.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/like-doomsday-pakistan-floods-wreak-havoc-sweep-away-villages-over-320-killed-video-captures-devastation/articleshow/123330946.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 12:57:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="5116369" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123331114,imgsize-5116369.cms"/></item><item><title>Sundar Pichai says AI changing hiring: Google makes surprise move; candidates now required to...</title><description><![CDATA[Google is reintroducing in-person interviews due to widespread AI-powered cheating during virtual hiring, as revealed by CEO Sundar Pichai. This decision comes after concerns raised by employees about compromised software engineering interviews. Other major corporations like Amazon, Anthropic, Cisco, McKinsey and Deloitte are also implementing anti-cheating measures, signaling an industry-wide shift away from fully virtual recruitment.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/google-ceo-sundar-pichai-on-how-ai-has-changed-hiring-for-engineering-and-programming-jobs-we-are-making-sure-/articleshow/123330269.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/google-ceo-sundar-pichai-on-how-ai-has-changed-hiring-for-engineering-and-programming-jobs-we-are-making-sure-/articleshow/123330269.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 11:51:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="22098" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123330236,imgsize-22098.cms"/></item><item><title>'Chori chori, chupke chupke': Rahul shares new video as part of 'vote theft' campaign; watch</title><description><![CDATA[Rahul Gandhi intensified his criticism of the Election Commission, employing a parody video to highlight alleged vote theft. The Congress party has launched a "Vote Chori se Azaadi" campaign and announced a "VoterAdhikarYatra" from Bihar, directly challenging perceived electoral manipulation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/chori-chori-chupke-chupke-rahul-gandhi-shares-new-video-as-part-of-vote-theft-campaign-watch/articleshow/123330676.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/chori-chori-chupke-chupke-rahul-gandhi-shares-new-video-as-part-of-vote-theft-campaign-watch/articleshow/123330676.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 12:33:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="878245" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123330744,imgsize-878245.cms"/></item><item><title>'Historic first': Tricolour hoisted at Seattle’s iconic 605-feet-tall Space Needle; watch</title><description><![CDATA[In a historic moment, the Indian flag flew atop Seattle's Space Needle on Independence Day. Consul General Prakash Gupta and Mayor Bruce Harrell attended the event. Several iconic buildings were illuminated in tricolour. King County and other cities declared August 15 as India Day. The event highlighted the strong ties between India and the US Pacific Northwest.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/a-historic-first-tricolour-hoisted-at-seattles-iconic-605-feet-tall-space-needle-watch/articleshow/123329181.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/a-historic-first-tricolour-hoisted-at-seattles-iconic-605-feet-tall-space-needle-watch/articleshow/123329181.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 10:40:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3479011" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123329356,imgsize-3479011.cms"/></item><item><title>'Congress caused partition': NCERT's new module blames party for 'blunders'; key extracts</title><description><![CDATA[NCERT's new modules on the Partition of India place significant responsibility on the Congress leadership. The modules assert that Congress leaders accepted Partition plans, underestimated Jinnah's influence, and failed to anticipate the long-term consequences of the division. The material highlights Jinnah's demands and warnings as key factors that led to the Partition, questioning the haste in transferring power.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/congress-caused-partition-ncerts-new-module-blames-grand-old-party-for-historical-blunders-key-extracts-from-books/articleshow/123331483.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/congress-caused-partition-ncerts-new-module-blames-grand-old-party-for-historical-blunders-key-extracts-from-books/articleshow/123331483.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 13:38:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="54832" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123332025,imgsize-54832.cms"/></item><item><title>No AI layoffs at Cisco; engineers face new pressure; CEO just revealed...</title><description><![CDATA[Cisco Systems is embracing AI to boost engineer productivity and gain a competitive edge, contrasting with peers using AI for job cuts. CEO Chuck Robbins emphasizes innovation over workforce reduction. Cisco's AI infrastructure focus drives strong earnings, exceeding expectations with significant orders from major tech companies, despite a slight stock dip due to security segment weakness.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/cisco-ceo-i-dont-use-ai-to-cut-jobs-i-just-want-our-engineers-to-/articleshow/123325311.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/cisco-ceo-i-dont-use-ai-to-cut-jobs-i-just-want-our-engineers-to-/articleshow/123325311.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 23:08:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43940" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123325289,imgsize-43940.cms"/></item><item><title>F-1 visa rejections explained: What’s fuelling student refusals; how you can avoid them</title><description><![CDATA[Many international students face F-1 visa denials under Section 214(b) due to perceived lack of ties to their home country. This refusal isn't permanent, and applicants can reapply with strengthened evidence of these ties, such as family commitments or property ownership. The DIGNITY Act, if approved, may ease restrictions by allowing dual intent for F-1 visas.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/study-abroad/f-1-visa-rejections-explained-why-students-face-refusals-and-how-to-overcome-them/articleshow/123329042.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/study-abroad/f-1-visa-rejections-explained-why-students-face-refusals-and-how-to-overcome-them/articleshow/123329042.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 09:47:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="66788" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123329035,imgsize-66788.cms"/></item><item><title>'War 2' box office: Hrithik Roshan, Jr NTR, Kiara starrer crosses Rs 100 cr mark; Janmashtami may hit day 3 biz</title><description><![CDATA[Released on August 14th, 'War 2' clashed with 'Coolie' at the box office. Despite a weaker opening day with ₹51.5 crore compared to 'Coolie's' ₹65 crore, 'War 2' surged on Independence Day, collecting ₹56.50 crore. The film has crossed ₹100 crore in two days, fueled by Hindi belt growth and Jr NTR's Telugu version success.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/war-2-box-office-collection-day-3-live-the-hrithik-roshan-jr-ntr-kiara-advani-starrer-may-see-a-drop-on-saturday-due-to-janmashtami-after-crossing-rs-100-crore/articleshow/123331316.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/war-2-box-office-collection-day-3-live-the-hrithik-roshan-jr-ntr-kiara-advani-starrer-may-see-a-drop-on-saturday-due-to-janmashtami-after-crossing-rs-100-crore/articleshow/123331316.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 13:26:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="64528" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123331312,imgsize-64528.cms"/></item><item><title>1999 Saudi murder case: CBI nabs fugitive at Delhi airport; lived 25 yrs under fake ID</title><description><![CDATA[Mohammad Dilshad, a fugitive wanted for a 1999 murder in Saudi Arabia, was apprehended by the CBI at Delhi's Indira Gandhi International Airport after evading authorities for over two decades. The arrest followed a request from Saudi Arabian authorities and a CBI investigation that uncovered Dilshad's use of a fake passport to travel abroad.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/1999-saudi-arabia-murder-cbi-arrests-wanted-fugitive-at-delhi-airport-after-25-years-was-living-under-different-identity-using-fake-passport/articleshow/123329797.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/1999-saudi-arabia-murder-cbi-arrests-wanted-fugitive-at-delhi-airport-after-25-years-was-living-under-different-identity-using-fake-passport/articleshow/123329797.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 11:40:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAJ SHEKHAR JHA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57510" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123330134,imgsize-57510.cms"/></item><item><title>Apple founder Steve Jobs lived by the rule that God is in …</title><description><![CDATA[Steve Jobs, the Apple founder, was a firm believer in the philosophy that "God is in the details," shaping Apple's DNA through meticulous attention to even the smallest design elements. His relentless pursuit of perfection, extending to hidden components, pushed teams to innovate and create exceptional products.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/apple-founder-steve-jobs-lived-by-the-rule-that-god-is-in-/articleshow/123320306.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/apple-founder-steve-jobs-lived-by-the-rule-that-god-is-in-/articleshow/123320306.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 14:36:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="70230" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123320303,imgsize-70230.cms"/></item><item><title>Mumbai rains: Heavy downpour floods streets, railway tracks flooded, red alert sounded</title><description><![CDATA[Mumbai grappled with heavy rainfall on Saturday, leading to waterlogged streets and a tragic landslide in Vikhroli that claimed two lives and injured two others. The IMD has issued a red alert for Mumbai and neighboring districts, forecasting continued intense rainfall. In Himachal Pradesh, the monsoon death toll has reached 257, with widespread disruptions to roads and essential services.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mumbai-rains-heavy-downpour-floods-streets-railway-tracks-flooded-red-alert-sounded-watch/articleshow/123329299.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mumbai-rains-heavy-downpour-floods-streets-railway-tracks-flooded-red-alert-sounded-watch/articleshow/123329299.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 10:35:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4296965" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123329667,imgsize-4296965.cms"/></item><item><title>Kangana Ranaut on live-in hypocrisy: ‘Men can impregnate and run’; reacts after Khushboo Patani’s criticism</title><description><![CDATA[Amidst the ongoing debate on live-in relationships sparked by controversial remarks, Kangana Ranaut shares her perspective, emphasizing the importance of marriage in society. She highlights the promise of loyalty a man makes to his wife and suggests that live-in relationships may not be as woman-friendly as they seem.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/men-can-impregnate-any-woman-and-run-away-says-kangana-ranaut-reacting-to-the-recent-debate-on-live-in-relationships-after-disha-patanis-sister-khushboo-criticised-aniruddhacharya-maharaj/articleshow/123327994.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/men-can-impregnate-any-woman-and-run-away-says-kangana-ranaut-reacting-to-the-recent-debate-on-live-in-relationships-after-disha-patanis-sister-khushboo-criticised-aniruddhacharya-maharaj/articleshow/123327994.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 07:06:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="62450" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328028,imgsize-62450.cms"/></item><item><title>'Tu kab se mera baap ban gaya?': How Irfan Pathan shut an abusive Afridi</title><description><![CDATA[Irfan Pathan revealed a heated exchange with Shahid Afridi during a 2006 flight from Karachi to Lahore. Afridi's initial taunt led to a verbal altercation, escalating when Pathan jokingly inquired about dog meat, implying Afridi had consumed it.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/tu-kab-se-mera-baap-ban-gaya-how-irfan-pathan-shut-an-abusive-shahid-afridi-up-completely/articleshow/123329813.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/tu-kab-se-mera-baap-ban-gaya-how-irfan-pathan-shut-an-abusive-shahid-afridi-up-completely/articleshow/123329813.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 11:29:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="46848" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123329967,imgsize-46848.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Ordered milk, lost Rs 18.5 lakh’: Mumbai woman duped in online scam</title><description><![CDATA[A 71-year-old woman in Mumbai was defrauded of Rs 18.5 lakh after attempting to order milk online. She received a call from a scammer posing as a milk company executive, who tricked her into clicking a link and sharing her banking details. Consequently, the fraudster emptied her three bank accounts, leading to a significant financial loss.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ordered-milk-lost-rs-18-5-lakh-mumbai-woman-duped-in-online-scam-clicking-link-exposed-bank-accounts/articleshow/123330800.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ordered-milk-lost-rs-18-5-lakh-mumbai-woman-duped-in-online-scam-clicking-link-exposed-bank-accounts/articleshow/123330800.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 12:38:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="114372" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123330856,imgsize-114372.cms"/></item><item><title>'Will you stop killing civilians?': How reporters put Putin on the spot with questions in Alaska; watch</title><description><![CDATA[In Alaska, President Trump and President Putin engaged in over two and a half hours of discussions primarily focused on the Russia-Ukraine war. Putin faced pointed questions from reporters about civilian casualties and trust. Following the talks, both leaders expressed optimism about a potential path to peace in Ukraine, though specifics of their agreement remained undisclosed.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/will-you-stop-killing-civilians-how-reporters-put-putin-on-the-spot-with-tough-questions-in-alaska-watch/articleshow/123328429.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/will-you-stop-killing-civilians-how-reporters-put-putin-on-the-spot-with-tough-questions-in-alaska-watch/articleshow/123328429.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 08:55:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="653775" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328411,imgsize-653775.cms"/></item><item><title>'Not like they wanted to leave': Ex-India bowler on Kohli, Rohit retirements</title><description><![CDATA[Karsan Ghavri alleges that Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma were compelled to retire prematurely from Test cricket due to internal politics within the BCCI and the selection committee. Ghavri claims that both players desired to continue playing, but were forced out, and Kohli was not even given a farewell.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/not-like-they-wanted-to-leave-ex-india-bowler-drops-bombshell-on-virat-kohli-rohit-sharma-retirements/articleshow/123329393.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/not-like-they-wanted-to-leave-ex-india-bowler-drops-bombshell-on-virat-kohli-rohit-sharma-retirements/articleshow/123329393.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 10:36:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="60860" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123329454,imgsize-60860.cms"/></item><item><title>The Trump-Putin Alaska summit explained: A real-time history lesson for students on world affairs</title><description><![CDATA[In 2025, US President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin met in Anchorage, Alaska. Alaska's location is significant due to its history and strategic importance. The summit aimed to address the war in Ukraine. Past US-Russia summits tackled nuclear arms and security. This meeting highlights ongoing challenges in diplomacy. It shows how nations negotiate and sometimes clash.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/learning-with-toi/the-trump-putin-alaska-summit-explained-a-real-time-history-lesson-for-students-on-world-affairs/articleshow/123330057.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/learning-with-toi/the-trump-putin-alaska-summit-explained-a-real-time-history-lesson-for-students-on-world-affairs/articleshow/123330057.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 11:34:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>LAKSHIMA SAREEN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="63632" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123330048,imgsize-63632.cms"/></item><item><title>Manipur: 3 women among 5 militants arrested; arms and ammunition seized</title><description><![CDATA[Security forces in Manipur arrested five militants, including three women from the KCP (Taibanganba), in Thoubal and Imphal East districts. Separately, a PREPAK (PRO) cadre was apprehended. Authorities also seized arms and ammunition during a search operation in Imphal East. The governor highlighted ongoing security efforts to curb extortion and the seizure of over 3,000 firearms in recent months.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/imphal/3-women-among-5-militants-arrested-in-manipur-arms-and-ammunition-seized/articleshow/123329122.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/imphal/3-women-among-5-militants-arrested-in-manipur-arms-and-ammunition-seized/articleshow/123329122.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 09:57:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="36374" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123329411,imgsize-36374.cms"/></item><item><title>Alaska summit: ‘Productive’ talks but 'no deal' on Ukraine - 10 takeaways from Trump-Putin meet</title><description><![CDATA[Despite warm gestures and ceremonial honors, the summit between Trump and Putin in Alaska yielded no concrete agreements, though both leaders expressed optimism and hinted at future contact. While his ODI place is secure, fitting him into the T20 side, which prioritizes high-strike-rate hitters like Abhishek Sharma and Sanju Samson, seems forced.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/asia-cup-does-shubman-gill-warrant-a-spot-in-indias-t20-setup/articleshow/123321062.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/asia-cup-does-shubman-gill-warrant-a-spot-in-indias-t20-setup/articleshow/123321062.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 10:51:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SHUBHANSHU DWIVEDI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43876" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123321199,imgsize-43876.cms"/></item><item><title>GST 2.0: 12% & 28% slabs set to go; sin goods face 40% levy</title><description><![CDATA[The Centre has proposed a GST 2.0 blueprint, aiming for simpler taxation with two main slabs of 5% and 18%. It commemorates Krishna's birth in Mathura over 5,000 years ago, symbolizing hope and righteousness. Celebrations include fasting, decorating idols, and reenactments of Krishna's life, with Dahi Handi being a popular tradition. The Bhagavad Gita's teachings are also remembered during this auspicious time.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/relationships/family/happy-krishna-janmashtami-2025-best-janmashtami-wishes-messages-quotes-greetings-images-pictures-whatsapp-status-to-share-with-your-colleagues-employees-friends-and-family/articleshow/123323667.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/relationships/family/happy-krishna-janmashtami-2025-best-janmashtami-wishes-messages-quotes-greetings-images-pictures-whatsapp-status-to-share-with-your-colleagues-employees-friends-and-family/articleshow/123323667.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 07:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="412083" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123323685,imgsize-412083.cms"/></item><item><title>Woman blind for a decade undergoes rare 'tooth in the eye' surgery and regains vision</title><description><![CDATA[Gail Lane, a 75-year-old Canadian, experienced blindness for ten years. An autoimmune disorder damaged her corneas. She regained her sight through osteo-odonto-keratoprosthesis. This rare surgery uses a patient's tooth as a new cornea. Doctors implanted her tooth in her cheek. Later, they placed it in her eye with a lens. Gail can now see faces and colors. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/woman-blind-for-a-decade-undergoes-rare-tooth-in-the-eye-surgery-and-regains-vision/articleshow/123328784.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/woman-blind-for-a-decade-undergoes-rare-tooth-in-the-eye-surgery-and-regains-vision/articleshow/123328784.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 09:16:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1038817" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328796,imgsize-1038817.cms"/></item><item><title>'Far from complete': CJI Gavai on 'equal India'; but lauds Murmu appointment</title><description><![CDATA[Chief Justice Bhushan Gavai acknowledged the progress towards an equal India, highlighted by Droupadi Murmu's presidency, while emphasizing that the journey is ongoing. He urged constitutional court judges to uphold liberty, equality, and fraternity, interpreting the Constitution broadly to protect marginalized rights. He also mentioned the contributions of various freedom fighters and social reformers.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/cji-building-an-equal-india-far-from-complete-but-murmu-appointment-step-towards-inclusivity/articleshow/123326561.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/cji-building-an-equal-india-far-from-complete-but-murmu-appointment-step-towards-inclusivity/articleshow/123326561.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 02:10:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1381366" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123326564,imgsize-1381366.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Coolie’ box office collections day 3: Rajinikanth's film strikes gold; storms past Rs 118.5</title><description><![CDATA[Rajinikanth's 'Coolie', directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj, has taken the box office by storm, earning Rs 118.5 crore net in India within three days. The film, featuring a star-studded cast including Akkineni Nagarjuna and Aamir Khan, has seen houseful shows across the country. Early estimates suggest 'Coolie' could surpass Rs 150 crore during its opening week, driven by strong audience reception and an extended holiday weekend.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movies/news/coolie-box-office-collections-day-3-rajinikanths-film-strikes-gold-storms-past-rs-118-5/articleshow/123327676.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movies/news/coolie-box-office-collections-day-3-rajinikanths-film-strikes-gold-storms-past-rs-118-5/articleshow/123327676.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 05:37:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="35456" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123327670,imgsize-35456.cms"/></item><item><title>WWE SmackDown: Alexa Bliss stuns Piper Niven; Street Profits extend streak and more</title><description><![CDATA[SmackDown witnessed Sami Zayn aligning with Jimmy Uso and Jacob Fatu against The MFTs, securing a victory in the main event. Alexa Bliss triumphed over Piper Niven, while Melo Don’t Miz defeated Fraxiom. Drew McIntyre addressed his attack on Cody Rhodes, and the Street Profits overcame #DIY. The episode set the stage for future rivalries and matches, including MCMG vs.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/wwe/top-stories/wwe-smackdown-results-8/15/2025-alexa-bliss-takes-down-piper-niven-street-profits-stay-winning-sami-zayn-jacob-fatu-jimmy-uso-defeat-mft-and-more/articleshow/123328256.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/wwe/top-stories/wwe-smackdown-results-8/15/2025-alexa-bliss-takes-down-piper-niven-street-profits-stay-winning-sami-zayn-jacob-fatu-jimmy-uso-defeat-mft-and-more/articleshow/123328256.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 08:04:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="95862" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328313,imgsize-95862.cms"/></item><item><title>Walking for heart health: How many step counts protect your heart? (and why you don’t need 10,000)</title><description><![CDATA[A recent UK Biobank study involving over 36,000 participants with hypertension reveals that exceeding 3,000 daily steps significantly reduces the risk of heart problems. Each additional 1,000 steps, up to 10,000, further lowers risks of heart events, stroke, and heart failure, with benefits extending to those without high blood pressure. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/walking-for-heart-health-how-many-step-counts-protect-your-heart-and-why-you-dont-need-10000/articleshow/123328534.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/walking-for-heart-health-how-many-step-counts-protect-your-heart-and-why-you-dont-need-10000/articleshow/123328534.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 08:38:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="581118" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328530,imgsize-581118.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[India-China direct flights resumption likely to boost trade, tourism and economic ties]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/india-china-flights-resumption-economic-ties-impact-19653647.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India and China are set to resume direct passenger flights after five years, a move expected to boost trade, tourism, and economic ties. The resumption comes amid growing diplomatic engagement, recent trade approvals, and ahead of Prime Minister Modi’s visit to China for the SCO Summit. Pre-pandemic, over 8 lakh passengers traveled annually between the two countries, with cargo flows also significant. Restoring direct flights is likely to reignite strong demand, supporting business, tourism, and people-to-people exchanges.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[On average in India, a senior First Officer earns about ₹5 lakh a month.       <description><![CDATA[Experts say proposed changes to the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code will only work if backed by a functional framework, not left to court-driven resolutions.       <title><![CDATA[Dashverse to invest $13 million Series A funding in AI R&D to build India’s leading creator ecosystem]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/dashverse-series-a-funding-ai-powered-tools-dashreels-creator-ecosystem-india-19652864.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Dashverse, an AI-driven entertainment startup, is set to invest 60-70% of its recent $13 million Series A funding into advanced AI research and development. With its microdrama app Dashreels surpassing 5 million downloads in just a month and ranking third on the Google Play Store, the company aims to build India’s leading AI creator ecosystem. CEO Sanidhya Narain highlighted the goal of delivering seamless storytelling through AI, tackling challenges like character consistency. Beyond consumer apps, Dashverse also offers AI-powered tools to help creators produce serialised content, aiming to democratise content creation via a thriving two-sided marketplace.]]></description>
